application_details: Inmates at Warkworth Institution were restricted from using savings accounts for family reintegration days.
decision_reasoning: Family reintegration days are community celebrations, not family-related reasons under paragraph 22 or private family visits under paragraph 23.
cost_awards: no costs awarded due to confusion in policy implementation
cause_of_action: Change in policy after audit revealed misinterpretation of Directive 860
procedure_followed: Judicial review application filed by Brian Dearnley challenging the policy change
